title: IBM Tivoli Training
description: IBM Tivoli training by Mindmajix offers comprehensive knowledge of all the concepts of the Tivoli software from basics to expert level through hands-on sessions with real-time examples. You’ll gain skills to implement, configure, and manage IBM Tivoli Storage Manager. This training also provides hands-on exposure to real-time use cases and projects, which helps you to clear the IBM Tivoli certification exam.
what_will_learn: |Construct links for navigation|Create and manage queries to access data|Build enterprise events and Integrate with Netcool or OMNIbus|Configure the agents running in autonomous mode|Manage workflow automation with policies|Create and use Agent Management Services|
prerequisites:
What are the prerequisites for the IBM Tivoli course?




The following are the prerequisites for learning this course:
Basic understanding of, 

Linux/UNIX and networking commands
Intercommunication skills
SQL 

Working knowledge of Tivoli Integrated Portal user interface is an added advantage.
instructor_bio: Srikanth has got 12+ of years of industrial experience working for global MNCs. He chose to deliver online training and contribute informative articles and blogs to various websites to share his technical expertise.

review|2|review: Thanks for everything Mindmajix. It's impressive, and great teaching capability. The sessions are interactive through which, I have gained in-depth knowledge on all the concepts of IBM Tivoli.
short_description: Leverage the growing demand for Certified IBM Tivoli Professionals

title: ForgeRock Training and Certification Course Online
description: This ForgeRock Course develops the knowledge and skills required to administer and deploy ForgeRock Access Management Solutions. Through hands-on exercises and projects, you’ll learn to install, configure, manage, and troubleshoot ForgeRock Access Management components. Finally, you’ll gain a complete overview of the features and capabilities of Forgerock from a technical perspective to determine how to integrate identity cloud into identity and access management solutions.
prerequisites:
Who should take the ForgeRock Training?




The ForgeRock recommends this course for the following professionals:

IT Professionals
Engineers
Modellers
Framework consultants
Developers
Architects
End users

title: OKTA Training and Certification Course Online
description: Mindmajix Okta Training makes you proficient at managing Okta services. This online course is geared towards administrators or consultants, who want to gain hands-on experience with Okta. Our participants will gain extensive knowledge about how Okta allows advanced user lifecycle management scenarios including security policy frameworks, map identity attributes, directory integration, supported SSO options, and more. The Okta online training is in line with Okta Certification’s objective, which helps you pass the exam on the first attempt itself!
what_will_learn: |Understand the methods to integrate custom B2B apps|Working with Okta’s Identity Management|Integrating application user management with Okta|Understanding the Components in OKTA|
prerequisites:
What are the prerequisites for the OKTA course?The following are the prerequisites required for learning OKTA Course:
Basic knowledge of,

Network administration
Cloud computing
Linux and Windows platforms

To enhance your skills, you can go through our self paced videos on:

Networking
Unix/Linux operating system.
target_students: |CyberArk Professionals|Okta developers|Identity Management professionals|Access Management professionals|
